Concert improvisé :D Un mec super doué s\'est mis à jouer du saxophone dans la rue ! Venez vite, c\'est impressionant :D

Do you want to launch the navigation ? OK Cancel Yes No Réessayer Localization Skip You don\'t have any Facebook friends using TiMapp. Share the app with them to get the best experience !
You must be logged in to perform this action No network access. An error occurred. Please try again later. Hey, where are you ? We lost you. Go out, breathe ! Sorry ours servers are currently unavailable. Please try again later Something bad happened ! Sorry, but something went wrong. You need to restart your application. If this message appear again, try updating your application. We don\'t have a fine location. Go outside and it will definitely work. Only one character for a tag ? What did you think ? That tag was too small. Maybe you should try adding a thousand more letters You cannot add any space to a tag. To submit one, please press the touch "Done" of your keyboard. Please add a tag. You cannot add more than tags. Your tag has already been chosen. Thank you for sharing ! Your profile has been saved Your profile cannot be saved for now. Sorry... Sorry but this action is not available right now. Try again later. Please correct required fields before submitting. Already up to date You are too far from the event to post something. Get a little bit closer ;) The event is over. Nobody can post anymore.\nThat\'s how real time works.\nFeel free to create a new event if it is still trending ! We need your location to do that Please wait %s before posting again Please wait %s before posting again We cannot upload this picture right now. Please try again later. This picture is too heavy. Choose another one! We cannot loggin with facebook right now. Try again later. Oops there has been a little probleme here, it will be fix in the next release ! Make sure your app is up to date. Please wait for the end of the current upload This event does not exist anymore The picture quality seems to be very bad. Try to take another one please. Sorry but we cannot load places around you for now. \nTry again later Timapp requires your location to find and share events around you. Please authorize us to get your location. GPS is disabled on your device. Activate it to create a place. If this Something bad happened when taking a picture. Please try again later. We cannot open this picture, please take another one.

The spot you typed already exists ! You can\'t create a new spot with the same name. Click on the category that suits the spot ! Find a good spot name :)
TiMapp is even more enjoyable with friends.\nClick the red button to invite them. Share TiMapp with your friends ! Share using

3 tags left 2 tags left 1 tag left Well done. Your tags will be displayed on your profile.\nAt any time you will be able to change them as you like. Define yourself Submit

%d selected
%d selected
Next With TiMapp,\n find & share geolocated events that are happening right now. Explore Two modes Map List Create Add the events around you on the map by choosing a name and a category. Your posts provide Real Time Rating for the community You can only post if you\'re located in an event. Share Post pics & tags Invite friends Popularity Ready to go ? Each event has points representing its popularity! However, the popularity points increase when people post pictures and tags. As time flies, the number decreases. If an event is inactive for too long, it is removed from the map. Let\'s get it started.
